title: Juniper Green inks pacts to supply 480 MW from solar-wind hybrid projects
description: Juniper Green Energy will supply 480 MW solar-wind hybrid capacity to GUVNL and NTPC. The GUVNL Phase 1 project generates 412 million units annually with 190 MW, while NTPC Tranche-1 produces 633 MU annually with 290 MW across Gujarat and Rajasthan. CEO Naresh Mansukhani highlights advanced hybrid energy solutions.
